projects.Name: SRMLaunchpad
projects.Description: SRMLaunchPad is an advanced online eLearning platform for B.Tech students at SRM University, offering video lectures, study materials, and interactive quizzes to enhance their educational experience.

projects.Name: Spotify Clone
projects.Description: The Spotify Clone is a web application built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring a responsive design, an intuitive user interface similar to Spotify, a mock music library, functional audio playback controls, and interactive elements like search and playlist creation, showcasing modern web development techniques.

projects.Name: SRMmessMenue
projects.Description: This website is designed for SRM University students to conveniently view their hostel mess menu and manage their daily tasks with an integrated to-do list. The platform allows students to easily check what meals are being served and plan their schedules efficiently, combining the essential functions of meal planning and task management into one user-friendly interface.

projects.Name: Netflix Clone
projects.Description: This Netflix-inspired login page, crafted with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, mirrors the sleek interface of the popular streaming service
